Natural Skill: Skill Trained (Choose 2 from any)
Skilled Heritage Human: Skill Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Clever Improviser: May use any skill untrained
Cooperative Nature: +4 Aid checks
Cooperative Soul: Failures and critical failures when using Aid with expert skills are successes
Inspire Imitation: After a critical success using a skill, may use Reaction to Aid an ally on the same skill
Monstrous Peacemaker: +1 Diplomacy and Perception to Sense Motive with creatures marginalized in human society
Student Of The Canon: All critical failures on Religion checks to Decipher Writing or Recall Knowledge are normal failures/Cannot fail to Recall Knowledge about own faith
Untrained Improvisation: +0 on untrained skill checks
Combat
Hit Points: 19 Armor Class: 14 (dexterity; trained) Class DC: Fighter: 15 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: None Shield: None
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +2
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +2
Incredible Ferocity: May use Orc Ferocity 1/hr
Multitalented: +1 Class Feat (multiclass dedication)
Orc Weapon Expertise: Weapon Expert (Falchion; Greataxe; Orc Weapons)
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Weapon Trained (Falchion; Greataxe)
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Expertise: Weapon Expert (Choose 1 from any)
Unconventional Weaponry: Weapon Trained (Choose 1 from any)
Attack Of Opportunity: May use a Reaction to Strike a foe that uses a manipulate action, makes a ranged attack, or leaves a square while moving
Double Slice: May attack with two weapons simultaneously
Incredible Improvisation: May add +4 to an untrained skill check 1/dy
Orc Ferocity: May retain 1 HP when brought to 0 HP 1/hr
Orc Weapon Carnage: Critical hits with a falchion, greataxe, or orc weapon inflict critical specialization effect
Orc Weapon Familiarity: Has access to uncommon orc weapons/Treats orc weapons as one category lower
Point-Blank Shot: Stance negates volley penalty from a ranged volley weapon and gives +2 attack at close range with a ranged non-volley weapon
Shield Block: Shield negates damage up to its hardness and absorbs half of remaining damage
Snagging Strike: Successful Strike inflicts flat-footed on target for 1 rd
Victorious Vigor: Gains 1 temporary HP for 1 rd when foe drops
Woodland Elf: May always Take Cover within forest terrain
Save: Fortitude: +6 (constitution; expert); Reflex: +7 (dexterity; expert); Will: +4 (wisdom; trained)
Save Notes:
Haughty Obstinacy: Successful saves vs. control are critical successes/Foe Intimidation (Coerce) fails are critical fails
Orc Superstition: May use Reaction to gain +1 vs. magic
Pervasive Superstition: +1 vs. magic
Magic
Magic Notes:
Adapted Cantrip: Knows a cantrip from a different tradition
Adaptive Adept: Knows a cantrip or level 1 spell from a different tradition
Supernatural Charm: May cast 1st level Charm 1/dy
Notes
Validation Errors:

Multitalented Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 9
Orc Weapon Carnage Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 5 and orc weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
Orc Weapon Expertise Feat: Requires level (currently 1) >= 13 and orc weapon familiarity feature (currently 1)
